lines.text:
[to Tony]
Lady, shovel the dirt and we'll haul it away.

[to Martin Canavan as both are laughing]
Remember the last time you tore up my contract and gave me a new one?

[still laughing]
Remember what I told you to do with it?

[laughing even louder]
Well, if you're not too tired, do it again!

[amazed as Johnson downs mug after mug of beer]
Where do you store it all?
Mike, ever had a woman make a fool out of you?
You're not going to marry my niece?
Tony, this isn't true, is it?
Just as true of other things that gentleman of the press has been writing about me.
